verses.text: \w Then|strong="H5927"\w* \w Nahash|strong="H5176"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Ammonite|strong="H5984"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w*: \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w* said \w unto|strong="H5927"\w* \w Nahash|strong="H5176"\w*, \w Make|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5647"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w thee|strong="H5647"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* Bezek; \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* thousand, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* thousand.

\w And|strong="H1568"\w* \w they|strong="H3541"\w* said \w unto|strong="H4397"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w that|strong="H4397"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w*, \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* \w shall|strong="H4397"\w* \w ye|strong="H5046"\w* say \w unto|strong="H4397"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* men \w of|strong="H4397"\w* \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w*, To-morrow, \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w time|strong="H4279"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w hot|strong="H2527"\w*, \w ye|strong="H5046"\w* \w shall|strong="H4397"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H8668"\w*. \w And|strong="H1568"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H1568"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* men \w of|strong="H4397"\w* \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w*; \w and|strong="H1568"\w* \w they|strong="H3541"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* said \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* said, \w Shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*? \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w*, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H5971"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.
